name: Cosmos (itch) (90south)
description:
In Cosmos you are a group of deities, persisting in the void, who join together to create a new universe through sound and the spoken word. It is a game for 3-8 players. The game unfolds in phases, through the accumulation of musical chords and the experience and ideas that they inspire in the players.

This game was written as part of a Clawhammer Games game jam.
